title: Books
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322022141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Books**  
A wealth of information has been published about the art of type. "The [Triumvirate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322022141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Triumvirate) of Typography"—selected primary works of three authors—offers a foundation for every great typographic library. Included below is an evolving index of notable books written about the art and history of [typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322022141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typography) and [type-design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322022141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/type-design).

[English](http://web.archive.org/12157#eng) : [Deutsch](http://web.archive.org/12157#deu) : [Português](http://web.archive.org/12157#por)
